      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean _testCells(generation.MazeBuilderEller builder)
      Checks that all cells in the maze belong to the set with id=1, as prescribed by this implementation of Eller's algorithm.
      boolean _testCellSets(generation.MazeBuilderEller builder)
      Checks that there is only one set of cells identified in the maze, that the id of this set is 1, and that all cells in the maze are contained in this set.

      Adds new methods to the suite of tests for Eller's algorithm beyond those specified in #MazeFactoryTest.baselineTests().

      • testCells

        public void testCells()
        Tests that all maze cells belong to a single set by checking the array holding set values. Calls _testCells(MazeBuilderEller).

      • _testCells

        public boolean _testCells(generation.MazeBuilderEller builder)
        Checks that all cells in the maze belong to the set with id=1, as prescribed by this implementation of Eller's algorithm. If any cell is found with any other value, return false. ***Expected result: all cells contain 1.
        Parameters:
        builder - a MazeBuilderEller Instance
        Returns:
        boolean that is true if the test is successful.

      • testCellSets

        public void testCellSets()
        Tests that all maze cells belong to a single set by checking the array holding set values. Calls _testCellSets(MazeBuilderEller).

      • _testCellSets

        public boolean _testCellSets(generation.MazeBuilderEller builder)
        Checks that there is only one set of cells identified in the maze, that the id of this set is 1, and that all cells in the maze are contained in this set.
        Parameters:
        builder - a MazeBuilderEller instance
        Returns:
        boolean that confirms the check
